EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Touched by the Moon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain the Magical Training feat.
Each Core ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to all Spell DCs +1 Spell Penetration +50 Maximum Spell Points +5 Cold, Negative, Force, and +5 Universal Spell Power

Effect.DisplayName: Magus of the Eclipse: Epic Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Deepening Arcana
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +10% Destiny bonus to Maximum Spell Points, and your Echoes of Power now restores up to 30 Spell Points. This ability does not stack with any other Epic Destiny ability that modify your Echoes of Power.

Effect.DisplayName: Magus of the Eclipse: Epic Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Nullmagic Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your comprehension of the arcane allows you to unravel spells at the base level, before they do any harm. When activated, for 20 seconds, you and allies near you are immune to harmful spells. Cooldown: 2 minutes

Effect.DisplayName: Magus of the Eclipse: Epic Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Nightwind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 Spell Penetration. Enemies who take damage inside your Cold or Dark Light zone have a 5% chance to be Frozen for 10 seconds with no saving throw.

Effect.DisplayName: Magus of the Eclipse: Epic Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Imperceptible Casting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -[10/20/30]% Spell threat. Rank 3: if you have the Discipline feat, double these bonuses.

Effect.DisplayName: Magus of the Eclipse: Imperceptible Casting

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Moonbeams
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Epic Strike.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Gloomspear
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Conjure a beam of eclipse energy at a single target, dealing 1d8+8 Negative Damage per caster level (up to a Maximum Caster Level of 20) and applying 3 stacks of Shattermantle. Cooldown: 6 seconds Cost: 5 Spell Points
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Moon Lance
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Fire a spear of lunar energy at a single target, dealing 1d8+8 Cold Damage per caster level (up to a Maximum Caster Level of 20) and applying 3 stacks of Shattermantle. Cooldown: 6 seconds Cost: 5 Spell Points
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Cloak of Silver
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Magical Resistance rating. Rank 3: +5 Cold, Negative, Force, and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Frostlight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle: You take half damage from Cold and, if you are not Undead, take half from Negative. If you are Undead, you take half damage from Light instead. This does not stack with Fire Shield: Cold or Cold Energy Sheathe.

Stance.Name: Frostlight
Stance.Description: Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle: You take half damage from Cold and, if you are not Undead, take half from Negative. If you are Undead, you take half damage from Light instead. This does not stack with Fire Shield: Cold or Cold Energy Sheathe.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Self or Summons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Augment yourself or your Summons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Great Summoner
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your summons, pets, and hirelings gain +4 to all ability scores, increased health, 100% Fortification, and a 40% increase to movement speed.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Impregnable Mind
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[2/4/6] Will Saving Throws and Concentration. Rank 3: You no longer fail Will saves on a natural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Moontouched
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to the DCs of Fear-based spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Call Upon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Summon a magical creature to summon.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Animated Armor
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons an Animated Armor to aid you

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dream Reaver
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Dream Reaver to aid you

EnhancementSelection.Name: Gargoyle
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Gargoyle to aid you

EnhancementSelection.Name: Golem
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Golem to aid you

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lich
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Lich to aid you

EnhancementSelection.Name: Living Meteor Swarm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Living Meteor Swarm to aid you

EnhancementSelection.Name: Succubus
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Succubus to aid you

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Moonlight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select Cold or Dark Light zone to cast

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cold Light of the Moon
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates a lingering AOE of moonlight. Deals 3d6 Cold Damage plus 2 per Caster Level (no Maximum caster Level) to enemies inside the zone every 2 seconds. The zone lasts for 10 seconds. While creating this zone is considered a spell, the zone itself is not - It is not affected by Metamagics or things that enhance Spells beyond Spell Power, but also cannot be dispelled. 25 second cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dark Light of the Moon
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates a lingering AOE of moonlight. Deals 3d6 Negative Damage plus 2 per Caster Level (no Maximum caster level) to non-undead enemies inside the zone every 2 seconds. The zone lasts for 10 seconds. While creating this zone is considered a spell, the zone itself is not - It is not affected by Metamagics or things that enhance Spells beyond Spell Power, but also cannot be dispelled. 25 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Frostlight Improvement I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Chill Aura
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle, enemies within melee range take 1d6+6 Cold damage per caster level and 1d6+6 Negative damage per caster level every 6 seconds. If an enemy would heal from either of these effects, they do not take the damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flash of the Eclipse
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle, your Cold and Negative spells have a chance to blast your target for an additional 1d6+6 damage per character level of the same type as the spell used, as well as applying one stack of Shattermantle. Each element and the Shattermantle application can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Lunar Insight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Ability Score to boost Arcane Insight with.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you use the Arcane Insight Epic Feat, the cooldowns of your Words of Power spell reset, and you gain 200% of your Charisma in Temporary Spell Points that last 60 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you use the Arcane Insight Epic Feat, the cooldowns of your Words of Power spell reset, and you gain 200% of your Intelligence in Temporary Spell Points that last 60 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you use the Arcane Insight Epic Feat, the cooldowns of your Words of Power spell reset, and you gain 200% of your Wisdom in Temporary Spell Points that last 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Magus Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a spell school to enhance.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchantment
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Enchantment DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Evocation DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Illusion
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Illusion DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Necromancy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Necromancy DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Lunar Imbuement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
When you hit an enemy with Moon Lance or Gloom Spear Epic Strike, you gain +5 Cold, Negative, Force, and Universal for 12 seconds. These spells also now apply 5 stacks of Vulnerable.
Vulnerable: You take 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Starlight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Cold or Dark Light zone now has the following attributes: Rank 1: Slows the movement of non-boss enemies that enter it by 20% Rank 2: Adds 5% Incorporeality to all allies inside the zone Rank 3: On expiration, the zone explodes, dealing 3d20 + 6 per Caster Level of the relevant kind of damage to enemies within.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Frostlight Improvement II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improve you Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nullmagic Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle, attacks you make and offensive spells you cast have a 15% chance to subject the target to a Dispel Magic effect, which may strip them of their magical protections, and will render them unable to cast spells and lose 4 Spell Resistance for 30 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Share the Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle, your summons now also benefit from it. For the purpose of this skill, these summons have your Cold and Negative Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Piercing Spellcraft
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spell Penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Nullmagic Protection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you are hit or missed by an enemy, there is a 6% chance that a burst of antimagic energy expands from your body. Nearby enemies are subject to a Dispel Magic effect, which may strip them of their magical protections, and will be rendered unable to cast spells and lose 4 Spell Resistance for 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Greater Beams
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you use Moon Lance, the target must make a Will save (DC 20 + highest of Int/Wis/Cha modifier + the highest of your Evocation and Conjuration bonuses) or be Frozen for 12 seconds. When you use Gloomspear, the target must make a Will save (DC 20 + highest of Int/Wis/Cha modifier + Necromancy bonuses) or be Paralyzed for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Unholy Pulse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
The effect of the Arcane Pulse feat now stacks up to 7 times.
+15 Negative Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Lunar Studies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Magus of the Eclipse Destiny Mantle, you gain Spell Resistance, Magic Resistance Rating, and Magic Resistance Rating Cap equal to 3 times the number of Metamagic feats you've acquired. This includes Metamagic Feats that are permanently enabled without costing additional Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Enhanced Metamagics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a metamagic to improve.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you [2/4/6] fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Maximize: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you [3/6/9] fewer Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Total Eclipse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Lunar Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Negative, Cold, Force, and Universal Spell Power. Your Moon Lance and Gloom Spear Epic Strike spells now deal 1d12+16 damage to enemies with 0 or less Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Time Stop
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Epic Moment: Enemies in a small area are Paralyzed and Helpless with no save for 10 seconds. They cannot die in this state, but if they are below 0 HP when they leave this state, they die quickly after the effect expires. Bosses and Raid Bosses in the area are instead made vulnerable, taking +100% more damage from all sources except bane for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Full Moon's Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a unique SLA.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Moon's Shadow
EnhancementSelection.Description: Necromancy SLA. Hit target enemy with a miniature black hole for 1d6+28 Negative damage per caster level (up to a Maximum Caster Level of 20). A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. Cooldown: 18 seconds Cost: 40 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Zero Degree Comet
EnhancementSelection.Description: Evocation SLA. Hit target enemy with a falling chunk of ice for 1d6+28 Cold damage per caster level (up to a Maximum Caster Level of 20). A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. Cooldown: 18 seconds Cost: 40 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magus of the Eclipse: Enhanced Metamagics: Intensify
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Intensify Metamagic no longer costs Spell Points.
